ovdesc.p: Identifies an ICA hierarchy, which is made up of a group or groups of compensation accounts.
A group consists ot a main account at the top of the group with sub accounts compensating to the main account.
The main account of one group can be the sub account of a higher level group.
A sub account of a group and be the main account of a lower level group.
The top account is the main account of the highest level group.

desc.p: Defines the main account, at the top-level, of the ICA Hierarchy i.e. the account that will be top of the group.
See field ICA.MAIN.ACCOUNT on ACCOUNT for a full definition of the main account.
Must be a valid account number.
Describes the ICA Hierarchy and should be meaningful to the user.
3-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. Mandatory input.
Can be from 1 to 10 alphanumeric characters
Describes, in a short form, the ICA Hierarchy.
This field holds the abbreviated description, of the ICA Hierarchy in the specified Language, which can be used for reporting and enrichments.
